msg: Update to the media types as of 2000-05-12. I also added the non-clashing

author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Some cleanup of winnt.c. Retry AcceptEx on failure in preparation for
socket reuse patch. Sometimes the recycled accept socket will not work; need
to handle this case by closing it and obtaining a new one.
